title: The Miracles of Kalu
description: Caught in a tropical storm Tom and Lucy are cast away on the shore of a small African country which is on the brink of civil war. An accident? Or were they drawn there by the powerful local god, Kalu? Their adventures (and misadventures), their relationships with each other and the lively characters they meet are fascinating and often amusing . . . but there is another side to the story, a problem which has cursed humanity throughout the world and throughout history â€” Ancient Tribal Instinct.
author: John Tully
